sentences.b3eb: Bedtime stories are much scarier these days [CARTOON]

sentences.e41e: Cartoon by Phil Johnson for MIT

sentences.7650: Needless to say, technology has changed a whole lot of things since most of us were kids. Even bedtime stories have been affected. Where will it end?

title: Bedtime stories are much scarier these days [CARTOON]
content: Bedtime stories are much scarier these days [CARTOON] Cartoon by Phil Johnson for MIT Needless to say, technology has changed a whole lot of things since most of us were kids. Even bedtime stories have been affected. Where will it end?
